welcome.title: Welcome to FamilyTree View
welcome.invalidFile: Please select a valid GEDCOM file (.ged)

personInfo.selectPerson: Select a person to view their details

viewModes.clickToEnableFiltered: Click a person to enable filtered views

privacy.introText: FamilyTree View is committed to protecting your privacy. This privacy policy explains how we handle your data when you use our application.
privacy.dataCollectionText: We collect minimal data to improve our service:
privacy.dataItem1: Anonymous usage statistics through Google Analytics (page views, feature usage, device type)
privacy.dataItem2: Your preferences and settings (stored locally on your device)
privacy.dataItem3: No personal genealogy data is ever transmitted to our servers
privacy.analyticsText: We use Google Analytics to understand how users interact with our application. This helps us improve the user experience. Google Analytics collects anonymous information such as your device type, browser, pages visited, and time spent. This data is aggregated and cannot be used to identify you personally.
privacy.localStorageText: Your application settings and preferences are stored in your browser's local storage. This data never leaves your device and is only used to remember your preferences between sessions.
privacy.noServerStorageText: All GEDCOM files and family tree data are processed entirely on your device. We do not upload, store, or have access to your genealogy data. Your family history remains completely private and under your control.
privacy.contactText: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at

terms.acceptanceText: By accessing and using FamilyTree View, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the application.
terms.useOfServiceText: You may use FamilyTree View for personal, non-commercial purposes. You agree to:
terms.useItem1: Use the application in compliance with all applicable laws
terms.useItem2: Not attempt to reverse engineer or modify the application
terms.useItem3: Not use the application for any illegal or unauthorized purpose
terms.intellectualPropertyText: FamilyTree View and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by the developers and are protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.
terms.userContentText: Any GEDCOM files or family data you process with FamilyTree View remain your property. We do not claim any ownership rights over your content. All processing is done locally on your device.
terms.disclaimerText: FamilyTree View is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee that the application will be error-free or uninterrupted. Use the application at your own risk.
terms.limitationText: In no event shall FamilyTree View or its developers be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising from your use of the application.
terms.changesText: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of significant changes by updating the "Last updated" date. Continued use of the application after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
terms.contactText: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at
